name: Salad With Garlic Dressing
keywords: escarole, olive oil, vinegar, raw, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 head (about 1 pound) firm, white escarole (once cleaned, about 6 packed cups) or other salad greens
2 cloves garlic, peeled, crushed and finely chopped (about 1 1/2 teaspoons)
4 tablespoons vegetable or olive oil or a mixture of both

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the salad greens thoroughly in a sink filled with cold water. Lift the greens from the water and spin dry in a salad dryer.
For the dressing, stir together all the remaining ingredients in the bowl that you will use for serving the salad.
At serving time, add the greens to the bowl and toss thoroughly with the dressing. Serve immediately.
